channel.title: Residue Processing - First Gaurd has no lines?
channel.description: I saved the first guard in Residue Processing by removing all threats to him. Now he just stands around, and will not speak to me, as if he has no lines.

item.title: Residue Processing - First Gaurd has no lines?
item.dc:creator: RiscIt
item.description:
…unless you give that up in exchange for saving him… At the very least he should be a default barney.

Read full topic
item.source: Residue Processing - First Gaurd has no lines?

item.title: Residue Processing - First Gaurd has no lines?
item.dc:creator: Ch00_z_3r
item.description:
That’s probably due to the fact he’s supposed to be eaten by the barnacle down the hall, thus acquiring a new sidearm.

Read full topic
item.source: Residue Processing - First Gaurd has no lines?

item.title: Residue Processing - First Gaurd has no lines?
item.dc:creator: David_VI
item.description:
Same here. I wondered if it’s normal, but it stuck out to me because every guard before has spoken or responded to me but he just stood there!

Read full topic
